ygData.subject: Re: Limit on song memorization
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Thanks for clearing that up for me Sharon! By the way - think what you want, but i wasn t being sarcastic =P Aside from Anthem not stacking with Celerity,
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "Sharon Mock" <sharon@...>
>
>You misunderstand -- he's saying that people stack Chant of Battle with
>Celerity because Celerity won't stack with Anthem de Arms.
>
> -- Sharon

> >From: "Blair, Keith (Keith Blair)" <kblair@...>
> >
> >I dont know what your problem is, but your sarcasm at my question was
> >uncalled for. Not to mention that I didn't say a thing about whether
>Chant
> >could stack with Celerity. I asked if Celerity stacked with Anthem and if
> >so, WHY someone would stack Celerity and Chant.
> >
> >> Yes, the reason why ppl stack Chant of Battle with
> >> Celerity is because it won't stack.
>

Thanks for clearing that up for me Sharon!

By the way - think what you want, but i wasn't being sarcastic =P

Aside from Anthem not stacking with Celerity, there is another reason i
would prefer to stack Chant with Cel: the STR and DEX bonus nicely
complements the trememendous AGI boost of the higher level song.

Sartori D'Elsiraad
Bard of Kelethin of the 38th Chorus
Veeshan
